name: A Tower in the Mists
description:
Trapped in a tiny tower, a small band of survivors passes the time until the end of the world.

My entry for the Ludum Dare 38, theme: A Small World

A small story attached to a combat system, both inspired by Lun Calsari's "The Way".

Control with the mouse (left/right click) or Z/X and arrows.

See README.txt and Attribution.txt in the download for more details and credits: https://bitbucket.org/sethhetu/ld38

I used a third-party Engine for this game, along with external assets (Grahpics/Audio). My work on the game was entirely focused on the combat engine, characters, and story.
